page.title: 10My Family.
page.content: I usually get up in the morning at twenty minutes to eight, but during the past few days I have been getting up at seven or at half past six beacuse of the row that the birds make outside my window. I shere my room with Julie who is my twin sister she is a minute older than me and she has the annoying habit of copying everything that Ido,for example if I go unstairs to read or to listen to records she will follow and want to do the same. I also have another sister who is called Debbie she is fifteen months older than us and she sometimes bosses us about. My Mum is a widow and she has to look after us on her own. We are a happy family and enjoy being together and sharing a joke.
